messages.message: The wired network will be configured using DHCP

message.div: xmrig - miner for calc hash by CryptoNight algo on CPU.
Since April 2018, various variations of this algorithm have appeared: cryptonight, cryptonight-lite, cryptonight-heavy.
Bind to screen(tty): screen(tty) for miner output (swithed by ALT+F1,ALT+F2,...)
Nicehash mode: set on for mine on nicehash.com
Coins on CryptoNight: monero(XMR) - cryptonight, sumokoin(SUMO) - cryptonight-heavy, aeon(AEON) - cryptonight-lite, and others
xmrig-nvidia - miner for calc hash by CryptoNight algo on NVIDIA GPU.
Since April 2018, various variations of this algorithm have appeared: cryptonight, cryptonight-lite, cryptonight-heavy.
Bind to screen(tty): screen(tty) for miner output (swithed by ALT+F1,ALT+F2,...)
Nicehash mode: set on for mine on nicehash.com
Coins on CryptoNight: monero(XMR) - cryptonight, sumokoin(SUMO) - cryptonight-heavy, aeon(AEON) - cryptonight-lite, and others
xmrig-amd - miner for calc hash by CryptoNight algo on AMD GPU.
Since April 2018, various variations of this algorithm have appeared: cryptonight, cryptonight-lite, cryptonight-heavy.
Bind to screen(tty): screen(tty) for miner output (swithed by ALT+F1,ALT+F2,...)
Nicehash mode: set on for mine on nicehash.com
Coins on CryptoNight: monero(XMR) - cryptonight, sumokoin(SUMO) - cryptonight-heavy, aeon(AEON) - cryptonight-lite, and others

messages.message:
ethminer - miner for calc hash by Dagger-Hashimoto (ethash) algo on GPU AMD.
Autostart: run miner on startup
Bind to screen(tty): screen(tty) for miner output (swithed by ALT+F1,ALT+F2,...)
Pool: pool_addr:pool_port
Coins on Dagger-Hashimoto: Ethereum(ETH), EthereumClassic(ETC) and others

ethminer - miner for calc hash by Dagger-Hashimoto (ethash) algo on GPU NVIDIA.
Autostart: run miner on startup
Bind to screen(tty): screen(tty) for miner output (swithed by ALT+F1,ALT+F2,...)
Pool: pool_addr:pool_port
Coins on Dagger-Hashimoto: Ethereum(ETH), EthereumClassic(ETC) and others
